tables.table_schema:
CREATE TABLE equipment (
  id INT PRIMARY KEY,
  name VARCHAR(255) NOT NULL,
  category VARCHAR(100),
  quantity INT,
  price DECIMAL(10, 2)
)

CREATE TABLE agricultural_tools (
    id SERIAL PRIMARY KEY,
    name VARCHAR(100),
    description TEXT,
    stock_quantity INT,
    price DECIMAL(10, 2)
);

CREATE TABLE equipment (
    id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    name TEXT,
    category TEXT,
    manufacturer TEXT,
    quantity INT
);

CREATE TABLE orders (
    id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    equipment_id INT,
    supplier_id INT,
    quantity INT,
    order_date DATE,
    FOREIGN KEY (equipment_id) REFERENCES equipment(id),
    FOREIGN KEY (supplier_id) REFERENCES suppliers(id)
);
